attributes.title: By far, the worst app on the App Store.
attributes.review: This app simply has no purpose being available on the App Store. This app is extremely bias, and leaves no room for discussion of topics that trump does not agree with! In addition, this app has no real reason for being up. There is no objective of the app, or need for the app on the App Store. Furthermore, I heard that trump likes to eat his burritos sideways, too! What?! That absolutely ridiculous!! How can we have someone in office who eats their burritos sideways?!?

attributes.title: Do not download this app!!!

I was shocked honey, I was in tears almost.

attributes.title: If you are prone to diseases, do not download
attributes.review: HORRIBLE APP. I have Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, corrhosis, diabetes, and triglycerides, and this app almost made me die! Yeah, I said it drop dead on the floor at the sight of this monstrous app before my innocent, yet mortified, young eyes. Do not download if you have been sick in any way. If you havenâ€™t, donâ€™t download in the sake of you becoming sick because of this app. Thank you, and Black Lives Matter, Hispanic Lives Matter, Asian Lives Matter, and Muslim Lives Matter.

attributes.title: Terrible!

attributes.title: Terrible app, crashes constantly
attributes.review: Whenever I open up this app it crashes almost immediately. According to all known laws of aviation, there is no way a bee should be able to fly. Its wings are too small to get its fat little body off the ground. The bee, of course, flies anyway because bees don't care what humans think is impossible. Yellow, black. Yellow, black. Yellow, black. Yellow, black. Ooh, black and yellow! Let's shake it up a little. Barry! Breakfast is ready! Coming! Hang on a second. Hello?

attributes.title: uhhhhhh let me tell you a story

I fell off my skateboard and got injured really bad and my family constantly got hurt. my point is that by downloading this app it may lead to a curse upon your family. be careful. every time something bad would happen a orange would pop on screen and start saying some false stuff.

attributes.title: I turned into a cat

But my cat came into my room while I was sleeping, took my phone deleted this app and nows where it gets weird iâ€™m actually not a person. I am the cat. The cat that now has an owner who is a cat. I just wanted to express my hate for having a cat owner, please turn her back into a human so i can eat
